column5: Another good spot in the NWO lost to fire.
No way! Wife's favourite spot to stop on the way to Winnipeg.
Bummer, I have stopped there several times.

Main building is toast but they saved the booze store!!. I assume both are owned by same people so maybe they can set up something temporary in booze building. Looks like the gas pumps where not effected so hopefully they can get that working again soon.

Wow. I was there last week. The place was an institution and will be missed, hopefully only temporarily.If there is any good news about this sad story, it is that similar establishments exist in Kenora so the loss is perhaps not as devastating to the community as it would be in a smaller town.
God bless them. Hopefully no one was hurt. I always enjoyed stopping there on my way to/from the Winnipeg airport over the years. PjShorthorn.
